participant_1.background:
I like to go for walks in the park, even though my feet smell.
my favorite french fries are from mcdonalds.
I think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk.
i love lasagna like i am garfield.
My passion is writing but my spelling is terrible, I'm still learning.

participant_2.background:
I spend my free time working on cars and watching baseball.
i like to make cellphone apps that would help heal our world.
I had a long career as an educator and mentor, but now I am retired and enjoying my golden years.
i drive a blue honda civic.
i enjoy eating italian food.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
It's been going well! I just got back from a walk in the park, how about you?
That sounds lovely, I'm currently working on my car in the garage.
Oh cool! What kind of car do you have?
It's a blue Honda Civic. How about you?
I love Honda Civics, I used to have one! Mine was white.
That's awesome! I've had mine for about 10 years now and it's still running great.
I'm sure it will keep running great for many more years to come!
I hope so! Do you like working on cars?
I don't know much about cars, but I love learning new things.
That's great! I've always loved working on cars, it's really rewarding to see your hard work come together.
I'm sure it is! I'm more of a hands-on learner, so I'm sure I would enjoy working on cars too.
If you're ever interested in learning more about cars, I'd be happy to teach you a thing or two.
Thanks! I might just take you up on that offer!
Anytime! My next project is to install a new sound system in my car
